ISTJ.name: The Reliable Manager
ISTJ.description: You always keep your promises and have a strong sense of responsibility!

ISFJ.name: The Warm Guardian
ISFJ.description: You take great care of friends and are very considerate!

INFJ.name: The Mysterious Prophet
INFJ.description: You think deeply and have unique, special ideas!

INTJ.name: The Strategist
INTJ.description: You're smart and great at making plans!

ISFP.name: The Artist
ISFP.description: You're emotional and have a great artistic sense!

INFP.name: The Dreamy Idealist
INFP.description: You have a rich imagination and a warm heart!

INTP.name: The Logical Thinker
INTP.description: You're curious about everything and think logically!

ESFP.name: The Free Entertainer
ESFP.description: You're bright and fun, and super popular!

ENFP.name: The Spirited Activist
ENFP.description: You're passionate and full of creative ideas!

ENTP.name: The Inventor
ENTP.description: You're clever and witty with great ideas!

ESTJ.name: The Strict Manager
ESTJ.description: You have great leadership and a strong sense of responsibility!

ESFJ.name: The Social Diplomat
ESFJ.description: You love hanging out with friends and are very popular!

ENFJ.name: The Righteous Leader
ENFJ.description: You're charismatic and great at leading friends!

ENTJ.name: The Bold Commander
ENTJ.description: You're confident and great at achieving goals!
